metadata.synopsis: one liner for the female elf  from the Bloomridge paranoia vignette
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 199, 35, -62- Talk to the female elf from the vignette.

0.speaker: Merriolle
0.text: Almost coming to blows over a pebble. What's this city coming to?

1.speaker: Merriolle
1.text: That rag, Baldur's Mouth - it isn't helping. Out to rile people up, I'm almost sure of it.
